pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R (3rd Edition) // Functions, data sets, analyses and examples from the third edition of the book ''A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R'' (Torsten Hothorn and Brian S. Everitt, Chapman Hall/CRC, 2014). The first chapter of the book, which is entitled ''An Introduction to R'', is completely included in this package, for all other chapters, a vignette containing all data analyses is available. In addition, Sweave source code for slides of selected chapters is included in this package (see HSAUR3/inst/slides). The publishers web page is 'https://www.routledge.com/A-Handbook-of-Statistical-Analyses- using-R/Hothorn-Everitt/p/book/9781482204582'.
